arguments.name: --backend_connection
arguments.help: URL of the OpenEO backend service (default: openeo.dataspace.copernicus.eu)

arguments.name: --collection
arguments.help: Name of the data collection (e.g., SENTINEL2_L2A)

arguments.name: --west
arguments.help: Longitude of the western edge of the bounding box

arguments.name: --south
arguments.help: Latitude of the southern edge of the bounding box

arguments.name: --east
arguments.help: Longitude of the eastern edge of the bounding box

arguments.name: --north
arguments.help: Latitude of the northern edge of the bounding box

arguments.name: --start_date
arguments.help: Start date for data extraction (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

arguments.name: --end_date
arguments.help: End date for data extraction (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

arguments.name: --bands
arguments.help: Comma-separated list of spectral bands to retrieve (e.g., B02,B04,B08)

arguments.name: --cloud_cover
arguments.help: Maximum cloud cover percentage allowed for data (e.g., 20 for 20%)

arguments.name: --output_dir
arguments.help: Directory to save the extracted data results

arguments.name: --jobs_title
arguments.help: Title for the processing job (default: 'OpenEO Extracting Image Job')
